patthana23.49:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
